HeroSection.tagline: YOUR JOURNEY TO WELLNESS STARTS HERE
HeroSection.headline: Find Your Perfect Mental Health Professional
HeroSection.description: Take the first step towards better mental health. Our platform connects you with qualified professionals who understand your unique journey and provide the support you need, when you need it most.

ValueSection.title: Heal Your Inner Child
ValueSection.subtitle: Find peace and well-being through personalized care.
ValueSection.description: Overspending on benefits programs with a web of providers? Struggling to boost team productivity and measure ROI? You've come to the right place. Our {integratedPlatform} is a one-stop care hub that centralizes our programs in a single application, providing access to services 24/7/365.

HowItWorksSection.title: How It Works
HowItWorksSection.subtitle: Your journey to better health and wellness in four simple steps

ServiceSection.title: Our Integrated Health Platform™
ServiceSection.subtitle: Multiple health and wellness programs to support your organization.
ServiceSection.subtitleLine2: They work great on their own, but are even stronger together.

eap.appointmentConfirmed: Perfect! Your virtual appointment today at 8:45 AM is confirmed.
eap.noCarePlans: You don't have any care plans yet

mentalHealth.therapistReady: Dr. Sarah Johnson is ready for your scheduled therapy session.

primaryCare.doctorReady: Dr. Michael Chen is ready to discuss your health concerns and medical questions.

wellness.trackActivities: Track nutrition, fitness, and mindfulness activities.

ProfessionalHero.headline: Focus on What You Do Best: Helping People
ProfessionalHero.description: Join our platform and let us handle the administrative work. Connect with clients who match your expertise, optimize your practice, and grow your impact.

MatchingSystem.title: Find Clients Who Are Right for You
MatchingSystem.subtitle: Save time and energy with our intelligent matching system. Focus on the clinical aspects of your practice while we connect you with clients who align perfectly with your expertise and preferences.
MatchingSystem.issueTypeDesc: Match with clients based on the specific mental health challenges you specialize in treating
MatchingSystem.therapeuticApproachDesc: Connect with clients who prefer your therapeutic methods and techniques
MatchingSystem.ageCategoryDesc: Work with the age groups you're most experienced and comfortable with
MatchingSystem.expertiseDesc: Leverage your unique competencies to help those who need them most
MatchingSystem.benefitDesc: Our precision matching means you spend less time on administrative tasks and more time doing what you love—providing quality mental health care. Every client connection is tailored to your professional strengths and preferences.

PlatformBenefits.title: Platform Benefits for Professionals
PlatformBenefits.subtitle: We provide comprehensive support so you can focus on what matters most—delivering exceptional mental health care to your clients.
PlatformBenefits.simpleManagementDesc: Provide us with your available time slots, meet your clients, and we handle the rest—scheduling, billing, and administrative tasks.
PlatformBenefits.stabilizePracticeDesc: Maintain a consistent client base and steady revenue stream. Focus on growth without worrying about fluctuating income.
PlatformBenefits.optimizeTimeDesc: Concentrate on clinical aspects of your practice and free up time for your personal life. We handle the business side.
PlatformBenefits.practiceToolsDesc: Access OWL Practice-style features including record keeping, scheduling, billing, and payroll management—all in one place.
PlatformBenefits.virtualLibraryDesc: Unlimited access to PDF books, research articles, psychological tests, and test correction platforms when needed.
PlatformBenefits.contentDevelopmentDesc: Get help creating podcasts, videos, and articles to expand your reach and generate additional revenue streams.
PlatformBenefits.professionalDevDesc: Free training programs and receive a note-taking tablet after completing a certain number of sessions.
PlatformBenefits.startupKitDesc: New psychologists receive comprehensive startup assistance and mentorship from experienced professionals.
PlatformBenefits.supervisionDesc: Get access to professional supervision when you need it, included in your membership at no extra cost.
PlatformBenefits.communityDesc: Join support groups for mutual aid, reflection, clinical discussions, and professional community building.
PlatformBenefits.psychiatryDesc: Access discussions with psychiatrists through our partnership with Averroes for comprehensive patient care.
PlatformBenefits.financialDesc: Preferential rates with accountants, OPQ membership fee support based on sessions, and investment fund opportunities.
PlatformBenefits.perk1: Become a shareholder and collectively benefit from our success
PlatformBenefits.perk2: Social mission: Priority support for clients in remote regions
PlatformBenefits.perk3: Reduced rates for family/child cases with joint platform support
PlatformBenefits.perk4: $1 per session contribution to an investment fund

ProfessionalCTA.title: Join Our Community Today
ProfessionalCTA.description: Take the next step in your professional journey. Join thousands of mental health professionals who have transformed their practice with our platform.
ProfessionalCTA.helpText: Have questions? Our team is here to help you every step of the way.

ClientHero.tagline: YOUR JOURNEY TO WELLNESS STARTS HERE
ClientHero.headline: Find the Right Mental Health Support, Fast
ClientHero.description: Connect with qualified professionals who understand your needs, no matter where you are. Begin your journey to better mental health today.

QuickAccess.title: Get the Support You Need, When You Need It
QuickAccess.subtitle: We make mental health care accessible, convenient, and personalized to your unique situation.
QuickAccess.findHelpDesc: No more endless waiting lists. Connect with qualified mental health professionals who are available to help you now.
QuickAccess.accessAnywhereDesc: Whether you're in a remote region or a major city, find the right professional who matches your needs, no matter the distance.
QuickAccess.startJourneyDesc: Begin with educational resources, self-learning materials, and readings while you prepare for your first session with a professional.
QuickAccess.highlightDesc: Every journey begins with a single step. Whether you're seeking immediate support or wanting to learn more about mental wellness, we're here to guide you every step of the way.

Resources.title: Take Charge of Your Mental Wellness
Resources.subtitle: Increase your knowledge, practice self-care, and prepare for your journey with our comprehensive educational resources.
Resources.educationalArticlesDesc: Access a comprehensive library of articles about mental health, self-care strategies, and wellness tips.
Resources.videoGuidesDesc: Watch educational videos on managing stress, anxiety, and building healthy habits to prepare for your journey.
Resources.selfAssessmentDesc: Use our guided questionnaires to better understand your needs and communicate effectively with professionals.
Resources.guidedMeditationsDesc: Begin your self-care practice with free guided meditation and mindfulness exercises.
Resources.premiumDesc: Unlock premium resources including personalized learning paths, advanced self-care techniques, exclusive workshops, and one-on-one guidance to accelerate your mental wellness journey.
Resources.benefitsNote: Start with free resources to build your foundation, then explore premium options when you're ready to deepen your practice and accelerate your growth.

ClientCTA.title: Take the First Step Today
ClientCTA.description: Your mental wellness journey starts with a single decision. Connect with a professional who truly understands your needs.
ClientCTA.helpText: Questions? Our support team is available to help you find the right path forward.
